nav.div: Carthage Central School District » Covid-19 Resources

p.span: Please use the menu on this page to navigate the different resources.

br.br:
4-16-2020
Per the executive order from the Governor of the State of New York, all schools in New York State will remain closed through May 15, 2020. As the district receives new information, notifications will be sent to families via phone and email messages. Please check this site periodically for new resources and new communications.
​

div.div: 25059 Woolworth Street, Carthage, NY 13619 | Phone: 315-493-5000 | Fax: 315-493-7036
